Made in Switzerland Buy Bitcoin directly into your wallet Simplify saving for the future Free Guide Select your bitcoin wallet A bitcoin wallet is the equivalent of a traditional bank account, only now you are your own bank. Set up a bank transfer A single or recurrent bank transfer from your bank app. We sent bitcoin directly to your wallet, in real-time. Receive bitcoin and repeat Receive a notification every time you buy bitcoin into your wallet. Repeat as often as you like. Success stories from our community Have no issues whatsoever with this company. Handles things fast and always friendly in the communications. Daphnee Have no issues whatsoever with thisâ€¦ GetBittr is doing my DCA like a finetuneable Swiss-Watch, always reliable by verified correct rates. Waltraut Irmscher Very correct service! No issues so far, payments are processed in market value and sats sent to wallet in few hours. Amalia Great service Very transparent about fees, and they use the REAL exchange rate for the purchase. Suzette Bittr is great for no-nonsense DCA right into your wallet. Easy to setup and run in the background. Terry Bittr is great for no-nonsens DCA Fantastic service and it worked flawlessly every single payment I did (every week since 2020). Riko BITTR satisfied customer since 2020 With Bittr I finally have found the smoothest way to buy: Minimum KYC, fast and professional customer service. Aunt Satoshi Smooth, secure and professional The Bitcoin go straight into my hardware wallet, perfect! The 1.5% fee of Bittr are well worth this convenience! Thomas Simple and effective The best and safest way to build up your BTC holdings. Once everything is set up the service is super hands off. Brian Safe and easy to use Your sats are sent to your non-custodial wallet immediately after they were bought, with a very competitive fee of 1.5%. Gino Bittr makes buying Bitcoin a greatâ€¦ See our 166 reviews on Trustpilot Ready to own bitcoin? Fiat Money Is Broken Inflation Printing money reduces its value and makes everything more expensive. No Security for Retirement With no control over money policies, unpredictable shifts can destroy your retirement savings. Waste of Time Endlessly searching for investments to outpace inflation consumes your valuable time. But you don't have to be frustrated anymore Low Fees A transparent fee so you know exactly what you're paying with no surprises. Your bitcoin are secured immediately, full control with no extra fees. Automate your savings plan Watch your savings grow automatically without additional effort. Why we think At Bittr we know you are the kind of person who just wants to live your life and put aside some savings for the future. In order to be that way, you need a better method than your bankâ€™s savings account. Inflation is the silent killer slowly eating the value of your savings. It's a frustrating reality that feels unjust â€” and we're on your side in this. Thatâ€™s why we use Bitcoin as savings technology, a deflationary money. Here's the straightforward Bittr approach: Initiate a bank transfer Receive Bitcoin and repeat Ruben Waterman Founder of bittr Our Partners About Most people get their savings eaten by inflation. With Bittr, you can buy Bitcoin straight into your Piggy Bank, saving in a currency that is deflationary by design. Bitcoin Price 59253.90 CHF/BTC What is Dollar-Cost-Averaging? thought: I now know the final answer {

observation.reason: //getbittr.com/. The website has no unusually low prices or claims of free it does not make claims of being able to get an amount of money that is generally not possible there are no texts that target human psychological weaknesses on the website there is no information on non-existent companies it does not handle different products from common e-commerce websites the inquiry phone number and email address are appropriate for business use the privacy of customer information notation is clear the payment methods are common and not unusual and the information listed has been updated.
